tika-abh06t11:8_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṁ vinanato vānaṁ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh06t11:8_1: vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti ca pavuccati amataṁ asaṅkhataṁ paramaṁ sukhaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:8_2: Vuttaṁ hetaṁ “yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti.
tika-abh06t11:12_0: Etaṁ ca nibbānaṁ nāma tayidaṁ santilakkhaṇaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:13_1: na paramatthato nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh06t11:13_4: paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṁ hitagavesīnaṁ yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato.
tika-abh06t11:13_7: Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t11:13_9: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṁ khayova dassito,
tika-abh06t11:13_10: tasmā rāgādīnaṁ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṁ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh06t11:13_14: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṁ khayova vutto,
tika-abh06t11:13_15: tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṁ khayamattatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:13_16: na cetaṁ yuttaṁ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṁ khayamattatāpajjanaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:14_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṁ khayo hoti,
tika-abh06t11:14_1: so dhammo rāgādīnaṁ khayassa upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno “rāgādīnaṁ khayo nibbāna”nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t11:14_2: “tipusaṁ jaro guḷo semho”tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:14_8: Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṁ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi bahubhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:15_5: Kiṁ pana rāgādayo gotrabhuādīnaṁ khaṇe khīyanti,
tika-abh06t11:15_17: Evaṁ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṁ, na itare,
tika-abh06t11:15_19: Addhā so ārammaṇaṁ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati.
tika-abh06t11:15_22: Nibbānaṁ pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati,
tika-abh06t11:21_11: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:21_13: Evaṁ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:22_3: ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhata”nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu paramatthavasena
tika-abh06t11:22_4: vuttattā “atthi nibbānaṁ nāma eko dhammo”ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:22_6: “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh06t11:22_7: ime dhammā appamāṇā”ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṁ khayassa appamāṇattaṁ kathaṁ yujjati,
tika-abh06t11:22_8: tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t11:22_10: titthiyānaṁ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṁ viya ca nāvijjamānaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:23_3: Parittārammaṇattike ca pana “katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti padamuddharitvā “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
tika-abh06t11:23_8: “Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t11:23_10: ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t11:23_13: Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na yujjati,
tika-abh06t11:23_16: papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t11:26_0: Paṇītaṁ saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, tāṇaṁ leṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:35_0: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṁ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t11:37_0: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṁ;
